textContent:
---adjustments---

Halu bby! Mag 2 weeks nako sa new job ko and so far, keri naman na sa adjustments. Nahahanap ko na rhythm ko ulit and di nako nastrestress gaano. 

Anyway,  i just want to thank you for supporting me all throughout. You were always there for me when i was stressed or pag mag ooverthink or pag puyat na puyat. You always finds ways to comfort me. You also help me in ways you do not know. Last week, nung pinipilit ko pang mag night shift, pag super tired nako and di ko na keri, iniisip lang lagi kita. Iniisip ko gaano kita kamiss, gaano ka kacute, gaano ka kaganda, and gaano kita ka gustong ihug. I love you so much bby!!!

Lastly, I just want to thank you. For being my constant bby despite all the adjustments I had to make. MWAAAA!!
title: June 28, 2024
textContentHtml:
---adjustments---


Halu bby! Mag 2 weeks nako sa new job ko and so far, keri naman na sa adjustments. Nahahanap ko na rhythm ko ulit and di nako nastrestress gaano. 


Anyway,  i just want to thank you for supporting me all throughout. You were always there for me when i was stressed or pag mag ooverthink or pag puyat na puyat. You always finds ways to comfort me. You also help me in ways you do not know. Last week, nung pinipilit ko pang mag night shift, pag super tired nako and di ko na keri, iniisip lang lagi kita. Iniisip ko gaano kita kamiss, gaano ka kacute, gaano ka kaganda, and gaano kita ka gustong ihug. I love you so much bby!!!


Lastly, I just want to thank you. For being my constant bby despite all the adjustments I had to make. MWAAAA!!
